column4: hey, anybody else is having issues with their install of diablo 3 on ubuntu ? my cd reader / writer is kinda broken, and it did eat the diablo 3 install disk after one ussage... then my internet gabe up and now the game says it is fully updated but i don't think so... i can launch the game, and see the awsome render intro, i even get to the login screen, can enter my password and stuff but when it comes to the character screen it do

esn't work... so i m thinking that it might have something todo with a messed up installation... i already downloaded the online installer from blizzard.net and try to run it throw wine, but that doesn't work either it gives some weird error messages  like: error code BLZPTS000007 can't run Agent programm something like that... i don' want to install windows just to fix this
did you check the appdb for cmpatibility?
